data.comment: The match is underway in Charleroi.
The first-half has come to a close in Charleroi.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
David Bates (Cercle Brugge) has received a yellow card from Christof Dierick.
Ali Gholizadeh puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 58, Charleroi move into a 2-0 lead through a Saido Berahino header.
Charleroi's Ryota Morioka has been booked in Charleroi.
Paul Clement (Cercle Brugge) is making a first substitution, with Charles Vanhoutte replacing Leonardo da Silva Lopes.
In the minute 69, The home team replace Saido Berahino with Shamar Nicholson.
The away team have replaced Kevin Hoggas with Thibo Somers. This is the second substitution made today by Paul Clement.
Guillaume Gillet is replacing Kaveh Rezaei for the home team.
In the minute 82, Goal! Charleroi extend their lead to 3-0 through Shamar Nicholson.
Guillaume Gillet instrumental with a fine assist.
Serge-Philippe Raux Yao is replacing David Bates for Cercle Brugge at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
In the minute 87, Charleroi make their third substitution with Ken Nkuba replacing Mamadou Fall.
Christof Dierick blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
At Stade du Pays de Charleroi, Kayembe has been yellow-carded for the home team.
